channel.title: Tibetan on Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Tibetan on Docs

item.title: It was once the "mythical beast" of China, and sold for millions and millions of dollars! Now it's a "wild dog" and no one wants it.
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: For the “smart” people of the country will not give up any opportunity to “build wealth”, and over the years the residents of China have proven that as long as this thing has the potential to “speculate” it It’s a good way to make money, but of course, those who come in later may become the “catcher”. I don’t know if you still remember what was once considered a “mythical beast” by some residents of China.
